info.description: A full-body charge attack.
Raises the user's Defense.
An attack that lowers accuracy.
A high-speed spinning attack.
Attacks 5 turns with rising power.
A Ground attack with random power.
Drops rocks on the enemy.
An attack that may raise all stats.
A Ground attack that lowers Speed.
Hurls boulders to hit 2-5 times.
An attack that may cause flinching.
Tough but useless vs. flying foes.
Very powerful but makes user faint.
A tackle that also hurts the user.
Has a high criti- cal hit ratio.

tmHmMoves.name: Dynamicpunch
tmHmMoves.description: An attack that 	confuses the foe.

tmHmMoves.name: Curse
tmHmMoves.description: Works differently 	for Ghost-types.

tmHmMoves.name: Toxic
tmHmMoves.description: A Poison move with 	increasing damage.

tmHmMoves.name: Hidden Power
tmHmMoves.description: The type varies 	with the #mon.

tmHmMoves.name: Sunny Day
tmHmMoves.description: Boosts Fire-type 	moves for 5 turns.

tmHmMoves.name: Protect
tmHmMoves.description: Foils attack that 	turn. It may fail.

tmHmMoves.name: Bulldoze
tmHmMoves.description: A Ground attack 	that lowers Speed.

tmHmMoves.name: Earthquake
tmHmMoves.description: Tough but useless 	vs. flying foes.

tmHmMoves.name: Return
tmHmMoves.description: An attack that is 	based on loyalty.

tmHmMoves.name: Dig
tmHmMoves.description: 1st turn: Burrow 	2nd turn: Attack

tmHmMoves.name: Rock Smash
tmHmMoves.description: Removes Reflect 	and Light Screen.

tmHmMoves.name: Double Team
tmHmMoves.description: Raises the user's 	evasiveness.

tmHmMoves.name: Fire Blast
tmHmMoves.description: An attack that may 	inflict a burn.

tmHmMoves.name: Substitute
tmHmMoves.description: Makes a decoy with 	1/4 user's max HP.

tmHmMoves.name: Facade
tmHmMoves.description: Double damage with 	Psn, Brn, or Prz.

tmHmMoves.name: Rest
tmHmMoves.description: Sleep for 2 turns 	to fully recover.

tmHmMoves.name: Attract
tmHmMoves.description: Makes the opposite 	gender infatuated.

tmHmMoves.name: Rock Slide
tmHmMoves.description: An attack that may 	cause flinching.

tmHmMoves.name: Explosion
tmHmMoves.description: Very powerful but 	makes user faint.

tmHmMoves.name: Stone Edge
tmHmMoves.description: Has a high criti- 	cal hit ratio.

tmHmMoves.name: Gyro Ball
tmHmMoves.description: Does more damage 	at lower speed.

tmHmMoves.name: Strength
tmHmMoves.description: A powerful physi- 	cal attack.

tmHmMoves.name: Body Slam
tmHmMoves.description: An attack that may 	cause paralysis.

tmHmMoves.name: Counter
tmHmMoves.description: Returns a physical 	attack double.

tmHmMoves.name: Defense Curl
tmHmMoves.description: Raises the user's 	Defense.

tmHmMoves.name: Double Edge
tmHmMoves.description: A tackle that also 	hurts the user.

tmHmMoves.name: Earth Power
tmHmMoves.description: An attack that may 	lower Sp.Def.

tmHmMoves.name: Endure
tmHmMoves.description: Endures any hit 	with at least 1HP.

tmHmMoves.name: Fire Punch
tmHmMoves.description: A fiery punch. May 	cause a burn.

tmHmMoves.name: Headbutt
tmHmMoves.description: An attack that may 	cause flinching.

tmHmMoves.name: Rollout
tmHmMoves.description: Attacks 5 turns 	with rising power.

tmHmMoves.name: Seismic Toss
tmHmMoves.description: Damage equals the 	user's level.

tmHmMoves.name: Sleep Talk
tmHmMoves.description: Randomly attacks 	while asleep.

tmHmMoves.name: Sucker Punch
tmHmMoves.description: Attacks before the 	foe does.

tmHmMoves.name: Swagger
tmHmMoves.description: Causes confusion 	but raises Attack.

tmHmMoves.name: Thunderpunch
tmHmMoves.description: An electric punch. 	It may paralyze.

default.description: It travels by rolling on mountain paths. If it gains too much speed, it stops by running into huge rocks.

Alolan.description: Its entire body is tinged with electricity due to the stones it likes to eat. It's very quicktempered.

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.description: Cannot be knocked 	out with one hit.

faithfulAbilities.name: Sturdy
faithfulAbilities.description: Cannot be knocked 	out with one hit.
